en.name: Tip #1: Trust Your Gut
en.content: If a situation doesn’t feel right, be a friend and safely intervene.

en.name: Tip #2: Enlist Allies
en.content: If you notice someone looking uncomfortable,ask staff or a friend to help you safely intervene.

en.name: Tip #3: Step In
en.content: If your friend has had a few too many and just won’t take no for an answer, step in, order a ride, and go home together.

en.name: Tip #4: Stick Together
en.content: If a friend has had a few too many, find the rest of your crew and go home together.

en.name: Tip #5: Check your ride
en.content:
Make a plan with your friends to go home together and when you request a ride, complete these three safety pickup steps to make sure you’re getting into the right car with the right driver:
Step 1: Match the license plate number
Step 2: Match the car make and model
Step 3: Check the driver’s photo
